name: Italian Theatre: Text and Performance
description: (Offered in English/Italian) A study of representative plays (comic, tragic, religious, melodrama) from the Middle Ages to Alfieri, with a consideration of staging and acting techniques mainly through the production of a specific play. [24L, 48P, 24T].
prerequisites: Prerequisite only applicable to students enrolled in an Italian Minor, Major or Specialist program, ITA350Y5 or permission of the department.
